desc.en: Shiroko rescues Sensei and eventually the two arrive at Abydos' Foreclosure Task Force club room. Soon after, the school is attacked by the Kata-Kata Helmet Gang, and Sensei teams up with the students to fight back.

desc.zh_tw: 老師被白子救出來後，抵達阿拜多斯高中的廢校對策委員會社團活動室。然而當時片方頭盔團卻來攻擊阿拜多斯高中， 於是老師就和學生們一起出面擊退他們。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师被白子救出来之后，抵达阿拜多斯高中的废校对策委员会社团活动室。然而当时片方头盔圈却来攻击阿拜多斯高中，于是老师就和学生们一起出面击退他们。

desc.zh_tw: 老師在遇見了白子之後，向白子表示自己是來出差的，但苦於找不到路。白子表示周邊地區均已廢棄，並向老師遞能量飲料喝。之後，白子揹著老師到達了學校。

desc.en: After defeating the Helmet Gang, the Foreclosure Task Force introduce themselves to Sensei at Abydos High School. Having solved some supply issues with Sensei's help, the students want to use their momentum to crush the Helmet Gang's outpost.
desc.jp: After defeating the Helmet Gang, the Foreclosure Task Force introduce themselves to Sensei at Abydos High School. Having solved some supply issues with Sensei's help, the students want to use their momentum to crush the Helmet Gang's outpost.

desc.zh_tw: 擊敗頭盔團重返阿拜多斯高中的對策委員會學生們，再次向老師自我介紹。在老師的幫助下，學校的補給問題已順利解決，這讓學生們非常開心。大夥們想趁勢破壞片方頭盔團的前哨基地。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 击败头盔团重返阿拜多斯高中的对策委员会学生们，再次向老师自我介绍。在老师的帮助下，学校的补给问题已顺利解决，这让学生们非常开心。大伙们想趁势破坏片方头盔团的前哨基地。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 击败头盔团重返阿拜多斯高中的对策委员会学生们，再次向老师自我介绍。在老师的帮助下，学校的补给问题已顺利解决，这让学生们非常开心。大伙们想趁势破坏片方头盔团的前哨基地。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 击败头盔团重返阿拜多斯高中的对策委员会学生们，再次向老师自我介绍。在老师的帮助下，学校的补给问题已顺利解决，这让学生们非常开心。大伙们想趁势破坏片方头盔团的前哨基地。

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force struggles to come up with ideas on how to pay off the school's debt. Sensei and the students run into the impoverished employees of Problem Solver 68 while grabbing some ramen after the meeting.

desc.zh_tw: 對策委員會的定期會議日。學生們左思右想償還9億日圓的方法，但卻想不到好辦法。老師和學生們結束會議後去吃拉麵，結果卻遇到窮困潦倒的便利屋職員。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 对策委员会的定期会议日。学生们左思右想偿还9亿日圆的方法，但却想不到好办法。老师和学生们结束会议后去吃拉面，结果却遇到穷困潦倒的便利屋职员。

name.en: The Ramen Store and Problem Solver 68
name.jp: The Ramen Store and Problem Solver 68
name.thai: The Ramen Store and Problem Solver 68
name.ko: The Ramen Store and Problem Solver 68

desc.en: Everyone decided to take Ayane to that ramen store to have a meal, and it was there that they met the Problem Solver 68. Spent all the money hiring the mercenaries, they could only afford the cheapest ramen; the owner took pity on them and gave them extra ramen. Aru talked with the Foreclosure Task Force, completely unaware of their identity of Abydos High School.

desc.zh_tw: 眾人決定帶綾音去拉麵店吃飯，在那他們遇到了便利屋68全員。因為錢都花在了僱傭兵上，便利屋68只能付得起最便宜的拉麵；老闆可憐他們，於是給了他們加量的面。亞瑠跟對策委員會交談起來，絲毫沒意識到是阿拜多斯的人。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 众人决定带绫音去拉面店吃饭，在那他们遇到了便利店68全员。因为钱都花在了雇佣兵上，便利店68只能付得起最便宜的拉面；老板可怜他们，于是给了他们加量的面。亚瑠跟对策委员会交谈起来，丝毫没意识到是阿拜多斯的人。

desc.en: Upon entering Shiba Seki, Master Shiba's warm welcome sends Aru into a screaming fit, unable to bear her guilty conscience any longer. Before anyone can stop her, Haruka plants a bomb and blows the shop to smithereens.
desc.jp: Upon entering Shiba Seki, Master Shiba's warm welcome sends Aru into a screaming fit, unable to bear her guilty conscience any longer. Before anyone can stop her, Haruka plants a bomb and blows the shop to smithereens.
desc.thai: Upon entering Shiba Seki, Master Shiba's warm welcome sends Aru into a screaming fit, unable to bear her guilty conscience any longer. Before anyone can stop her, Haruka plants a bomb and blows the shop to smithereens.
desc.ko: Upon entering Shiba Seki, Master Shiba's warm welcome sends Aru into a screaming fit, unable to bear her guilty conscience any longer. Before anyone can stop her, Haruka plants a bomb and blows the shop to smithereens.
desc.zh_tw: 亞瑠在柴關拉麵店吃拉麵時，聽了老闆的窩心鼓勵，終於承受不住良心的譴責而放聲喊叫。然而遙香卻誤解亞的喊叫，反而把炸彈裝在店裡，把柴關拉麵店炸得不留痕跡。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 亚瑠在柴关拉面店吃拉面时，听了老板的窝心鼓励，终于承受不住良心的谴责而放声喊叫。然而遥香却误解亚的喊叫，反而把炸弹装在店里，把柴关拉面店炸得不留痕迹。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 亚瑠在柴关拉面店吃拉面时，听了老板的窝心鼓励，终于承受不住良心的谴责而放声喊叫。然而遥香却误解亚的喊叫，反而把炸弹装在店里，把柴关拉面店炸得不留痕迹。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 亚瑠在柴关拉面店吃拉面时，听了老板的窝心鼓励，终于承受不住良心的谴责而放声喊叫。然而遥香却误解亚的喊叫，反而把炸弹装在店里，把柴关拉面店炸得不留痕迹。

desc.en: The ramen restaurant owner mistook the Problem Solver 68 for Abydos' friends. Aru suddenly realized that it was the restaurant that prevented her being a real villain. Haruka, who was unsure of Aru's saying, blew up the restaurant without a second thought.
desc.jp: The ramen restaurant owner mistook the Problem Solver 68 for Abydos' friends. Aru suddenly realized that it was the restaurant that prevented her being a real villain. Haruka, who was unsure of Aru's saying, blew up the restaurant without a second thought.

desc.zh_tw: 拉麵店老闆錯認便利屋68為阿拜多斯的朋友，亞瑠突然間精神錯亂，認為是這家拉麵店阻礙了她成為真正的壞蛋。遙香尚未聽清就反手炸掉了拉麵店。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 拉面店老板错认便利屋68为阿拜多斯的朋友，亚瑠突然间领悟到了什么，认为是这家拉面店阻碍了她成为真正的坏蛋。遥香尚未听清就反手炸掉了拉面店。

desc.en: Seminar's treasurer, Yuuka, intends to shut down the Game Development Department due to its lackluster performance. And so, Midori and Momoi head to the ruins in search of a secret weapon to prevent their club's closure.
desc.jp: Seminar's treasurer, Yuuka, intends to shut down the Game Development Department due to its lackluster performance. And so, Midori and Momoi head to the ruins in search of a secret weapon to prevent their club's closure.
desc.thai: Seminar's treasurer, Yuuka, intends to shut down the Game Development Department due to its lackluster performance. And so, Midori and Momoi head to the ruins in search of a secret weapon to prevent their club's closure.
desc.ko: Seminar's treasurer, Yuuka, intends to shut down the Game Development Department due to its lackluster performance. And so, Midori and Momoi head to the ruins in search of a secret weapon to prevent their club's closure.
desc.zh_tw: 研討會的會計優香，打算以遊戲開發部實績不佳為由關閉社團。綠和桃井為了反抗優香，便前往<廢墟>尋找秘密武器。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 研讨会的会计优香，打算以游戏开发部实绩不佳为由关闭社团。绿和桃井为了反抗优香，便前往<废墟>寻找秘密武器。

desc.en: Yuuka came to explain the situation, stating that the closure was inevitable. Momoi and Midori argued righteously, but was greeted with the mock of their only product - TSC, the very game that won the first place of The Worst Game of The Year.
desc.jp: Yuuka came to explain the situation, stating that the closure was inevitable. Momoi and Midori argued righteously, but was greeted with the mock of their only product - TSC, the very game that won the first place of The Worst Game of The Year.
desc.thai: Yuuka came to explain the situation, stating that the closure was inevitable. Momoi and Midori argued righteously, but was greeted with the mock of their only product - TSC, the very game that won the first place of The Worst Game of The Year.
desc.ko: Yuuka came to explain the situation, stating that the closure was inevitable. Momoi and Midori argued righteously, but was greeted with the mock of their only product - TSC, the very game that won the first place of The Worst Game of The Year.
desc.zh_tw: 優香前來解釋情況，表示廢社是板上釘釘的事情。桃井與綠據理力爭，但反遭優香冷嘲熱諷了一下社團的唯一成果——“年度垃圾遊戲排行榜第一名”的《故事·傳說·編年史》。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 优香前来解释情况，表示废社是板上钉钉的事情。桃井与绿据理力争，但反遭优香冷嘲热讽了一下社团的唯一成果——“年度垃圾游戏排行榜第一名”的《故事·传说·编年史》。

desc.en: When Yuuka started demanding them to take all the things out and calling them "just some junks", Momoi suddenly made it clear that they'll surely secure the Prize and be at the top one. Though time limited to only two short weeks, Yuuka finally agreed.
desc.jp: When Yuuka started demanding them to take all the things out and calling them "just some junks", Momoi suddenly made it clear that they'll surely secure the Prize and be at the top one. Though time limited to only two short weeks, Yuuka finally agreed.

desc.zh_tw: 就在優香讓兩人將東西全部清走，並稱它們為“亂七八糟的東西”時，桃井突然聲稱他們一定能在“千年大賞”上拿出成果、斬獲名次——但時間只有兩週。優香最後同意。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 就在优香让两人将东西全部清走，并称它们为“乱七八糟的东西”时，桃井突然声称他们一定能在“千年大赏”上拿出成果、斩获名次——但时间只有两周。优香最后同意。

desc.en: The Game Development Department heads to the Engineering Department to get Aris a firearm. Aris ends up picking a railgun meant to be attached to an intergalactic battleship. The Engineering Department challenges Aris to a fight to test her abilities.
desc.jp: The Game Development Department heads to the Engineering Department to get Aris a firearm. Aris ends up picking a railgun meant to be attached to an intergalactic battleship. The Engineering Department challenges Aris to a fight to test her abilities.

desc.ko: The Game Development Department heads to the Engineering Department to get Aris a firearm. Aris ends up picking a railgun meant to be attached to an intergalactic battleship. The Engineering Department challenges Aris to a fight to test her abilities.
desc.zh_tw: 遊戲開發部學生為了取得能讓愛麗絲使用的槍支,便前往 千年學園的<工程師部>。愛麗絲在那裡選擇了宇宙戰艦用的軌道砲。工程師部為了測試她的能力而向她挑戰。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部学生为了取得能让爱丽丝使用的枪支,便前往 千年学园的<工程师部>。爱丽丝在那里选择了宇宙战舰用的轨道炮。工程师部为了测试她的能力而向她挑战。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 游戏开发部学生为了取得能让爱丽丝使用的枪支,便前往 千年学园的<工程师部>。爱丽丝在那里选择了宇宙战舰用的轨道炮。工程师部为了测试她的能力而向她挑战。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 游戏开发部学生为了取得能让爱丽丝使用的枪支,便前往 千年学园的<工程师部>。爱丽丝在那里选择了宇宙战舰用的轨道炮。工程师部为了测试她的能力而向她挑战。

desc.en: Aris skillfully uses the railgun to fend off the Engineering Department members, despite never having held such a weapon before. Utaha, the president of the Engineering Department, begins to become suspicious of Aris' unusual physical prowess.
desc.jp: Aris skillfully uses the railgun to fend off the Engineering Department members, despite never having held such a weapon before. Utaha, the president of the Engineering Department, begins to become suspicious of Aris' unusual physical prowess.

desc.ko: Aris skillfully uses the railgun to fend off the Engineering Department members, despite never having held such a weapon before. Utaha, the president of the Engineering Department, begins to become suspicious of Aris' unusual physical prowess.
desc.zh_tw: 愛麗絲熟練地使用從沒碰過的軌道砲，壓制了工程師部。工程師部的部長詠葉見狀，便害怕起愛麗絲卓越的身體素質。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝熟练地使用从没碰过的轨道炮,压制了工程师部。工程师部的部长咏叶见状，便害怕起爱丽丝卓越的身体素质。

desc.en: Utaha and others welcomed them, and Hibiki took the initiative to choose weapons for Aris. But Aris soon put her attention onto a railgun, which was them introduced by Kotori. She mentioned that the development was terminated due to funding issues. All of the Engineering Department thought Aris couldn't lift it up, but Aris had not only lifted it, but also left a hole on the club room; as a last resort, the Engineering Department challenged the Game Development Club, who can take it away if they won them.
desc.jp: Utaha and others welcomed them, and Hibiki took the initiative to choose weapons for Aris. But Aris soon put her attention onto a railgun, which was them introduced by Kotori. She mentioned that the development was terminated due to funding issues. All of the Engineering Department thought Aris couldn't lift it up, but Aris had not only lifted it, but also left a hole on the club room; as a last resort, the Engineering Department challenged the Game Development Club, who can take it away if they won them.
desc.thai: Utaha and others welcomed them, and Hibiki took the initiative to choose weapons for Aris. But Aris soon put her attention onto a railgun, which was them introduced by Kotori. She mentioned that the development was terminated due to funding issues. All of the Engineering Department thought Aris couldn't lift it up, but Aris had not only lifted it, but also left a hole on the club room; as a last resort, the Engineering Department challenged the Game Development Club, who can take it away if they won them.
desc.ko: Utaha and others welcomed them, and Hibiki took the initiative to choose weapons for Aris. But Aris soon put her attention onto a railgun, which was them introduced by Kotori. She mentioned that the development was terminated due to funding issues. All of the Engineering Department thought Aris couldn't lift it up, but Aris had not only lifted it, but also left a hole on the club room; as a last resort, the Engineering Department challenged the Game Development Club, who can take it away if they won them.
desc.zh_tw: 詠葉等工程師部的學生歡迎了開發部一行人。響主動提出要為愛麗絲找武器，但愛麗絲很快把注意力放到了一門軌道炮上。亞都梨主動為愛麗絲介紹了這門傑作，提到由於資金問題這門大砲的研發已經終止。工程師部眾人本以為愛麗絲無法舉起它，但後者不僅拿起了它，還不小心給房頂開了個洞；不得已，工程師部決定測試遊戲開發部眾人的能力，達標後才能拿走。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 咏叶等工程师部的学生欢迎了开发部一行人。响主动提出要为爱丽丝找武器，但爱丽丝很快把注意力放到了一门轨道炮上。亚都梨主动为爱丽丝介绍了这门杰作，提到由于资金问题这门大炮的研发已经终止。工程师部众人本以为爱丽丝无法举起它，但后者不仅拿起了它，还不小心给房顶开了个洞；不得已，工程师部决定测试游戏开发部众人的能力，达标后才能拿走。

desc.zh_tw: 在愛麗絲和貝里塔斯成員進行佯攻作戰的時候,綠、桃井 和老師一起嘗試正面突破研討會。

desc.en: Aris took the role as forceful breakthrough girl, but was arrested at last. Akane expressed her liking towards Aris. Yuuka suddenly realized the trap in it, and enjoined the subordinate to replace the security system with the ones that were not from the Engineering Department.

desc.en: During the meeting held two hours ago, Hare mentioned that the only way to access the Contraband Room would be the lifts. Yet both the lifts and the doors on the top floor should only be verified by fingerprints, and failed to verify that would also trigger multiple mechanisms. In order to break through the security system, Hibiki proposed to disable the system for a while, and by that means the Veritas would be able to start hacking.

desc.zh_tw: 兩小時前的作戰會議中，晴提到到達保管所的地方唯有通過電梯到達，然而電梯和頂樓各區域的門只能通過指紋驗證，且驗證失敗還會觸發多種機關。為了突破安全系統，響提出用EMP手雷癱瘓所有系統，到時貝里塔斯即可開始駭入。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 两小时前的作战会议中，晴提到到达保管所的地方唯有通过电梯到达，然而电梯和顶楼各区域的门只能通过指纹验证，且验证失败还会触发多种机关。为了突破安全系统，响提出用EMP手雷瘫痪所有系统，到时贝里塔斯即可开始骇入。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 两小时前的作战会议中，晴提到到达保管所的地方唯有通过电梯到达，然而电梯和顶楼各区域的门只能通过指纹验证，且验证失败还会触发多种机关。为了突破安全系统，响提出用EMP手雷瘫痪所有系统，到时贝里塔斯即可开始骇入。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 两小时前的作战会议中，晴提到到达保管所的地方唯有通过电梯到达，然而电梯和顶楼各区域的门只能通过指纹验证，且验证失败还会触发多种机关。为了突破安全系统，响提出用EMP手雷瘫痪所有系统，到时贝里塔斯即可开始骇入。

desc.zh_tw: 朱音以為碰見了桃井和綠，實際上卻是工程師部的真紀與亞都梨。朱音向優香請求確認監控狀態，這時大家才意識到監控已被駭入。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 朱音以为碰见了桃井和绿，实际上却是工程师部的真纪与亚都梨。朱音向优香请求确认监控状态，这时大家才意识到监控已被骇入。

desc.en: Momoi and Midori was at the lift, while Akane and others were locked up together due to the unmatched fingerprints. Yuuka realized the trap set by Aris too late. Momoi, Midori and Sensei arrived at the floor and successfully unlocked with their own fingerprints, yet they were met with other Seminar members.

desc.zh_tw: 桃井和綠到達了電梯前，與此同時朱音等人卻因指紋不符而被一同關了起來。這時優香才意識到愛麗絲的問題，而桃井、綠與老師三人已經到達頂樓，並順利用指紋開鎖，但還是遇到了學生會成員。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃井和绿到达了电梯前，与此同时朱音等人却因指纹不符而被一同关了起来。这时优香才意识到爱丽丝的问题，而桃井、绿与老师三人已经到达顶楼，并顺利用指纹开锁，但还是遇到了学生会成员。
